name: Captain America and The Avengers
description: Captain America and the Avengers (キャプテンアメリカアンドジアベンジャーズ, Kyaputen Amerika ando ji Abenjāzu) is an arcade game developed and released by Data East in 1991. It features the Marvel Comics characters The Avengers in a side-scrolling brawling and shooting adventure to defeat the evil Red Skull. The game received ports for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive, Super Nintendo Entertainment System, Game Boy and Game Gear. A different Data East game was released for the Nintendo Entertainment System.
